segments.text: Do you even know where this bus is supposed to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should take us all the way up to Altadena .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not positive if it does or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this the right bus , or not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never been on this bus , but I'm sure it's the right one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are we ? This is not Altadena .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , and we've been on the bus forever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what the street signs say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh my gosh , that one says Temple City .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time , I'll look for the bus myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , now I know the bus that'll take us back .
segments.speaker: S2
